ds:field.name: hasDPJAccess
ds:field.description: This field will be returned only if the user has DPJ license

ds:field.name: hasXPPAccess
ds:field.description: This field will be returned only if the user has XPP or XWP license

ds:selectable.expression: evaluate[if type == 'Inbox Task' AND attribute[Title] != '' then attribute[Title] else name]

ds:field.name: originated
ds:field.description: The originated date of the task.

ds:field.name: typeicon
ds:field.description: The type icon based on the type of the task.

ds:field.name: sequenceOrder
ds:field.description: the task sequence id within a project.

ds:field.name: taskWBS
ds:field.description: the task WBS within a project.

ds:field.name: taskWeightage
ds:field.description: the task Weightage within a project.

ds:selectable.expression: evaluate[if type == 'Inbox Task' then attribute[Scheduled Completion Date] else if attribute[Task Estimated Finish Date] != '' then attribute[Task Estimated Finish Date] else originated]

ds:field.name: taskWBS
ds:field.description: the task WBS within a project.

ds:field.name: previousTaskId
ds:field.description: used for updating the sequence order as an alternative to setting sequence order.

ds:field.name: notes
ds:field.description: Additional notes associated to the task

ds:selectable.expression: evaluate[if type == 'Inbox Task' then attribute[Review Task] else attribute[Needs Review]]
evaluate[if type == 'Inbox Task' then from[Route Task].to.id else id]

ds:field.name: routeTaskInstructions
ds:field.description: Route Task Instructions for route-based tasks.
